metadata.title: CVE-2022-25514 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** stb_truetype.h v1.26 was discovered to contain aheap-buffer-overflow via the function ttUSHORT() at stb_truetype.h. NOTE:Third party has disputed stating that the source code has also a disclaimerthat it should only be used with trusted input.

criterions.comment: libstb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
